Name: Dataset of Concurrent EEG, ECG, and Behavior with Multiple Doses of transcranial Electrical Stimulation - BIDS
ReferencesAndLinks: Gebodh, Nigel, Esmaeilpour, Zeinab, Datta, Abhishek, & Bikson, Marom. (2020). Dataset of Concurrent EEG, ECG, and Behavior with Multiple Doses of transcranial Electrical Stimulation (Version All) [Data set]. Zenodo. http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3837212
